text: The Mountain of Smoke is a hill in the Southern Governorate of Bahrain. At above mean sea level, it is the country's highest point. The Mountain of Smoke is named because of the haze which often surrounds it on humid days. A number of caves are around the mountain.(Archived by the Internet Archivehere, archived by WebCite , Google cache entry here) == References == Category:Hills of Asia Category:Geography of Bahrain
title: Mountain of Smoke
